import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Header({ isMenuOpen, toggleMenu }) { const [scrolled, setScrolled] = useState(false); const [showNotifications, setShowNotifications] = useState(false); // Add scroll event listener useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { if (window.scrollY > 10) { setScrolled(true); } else { setScrolled(false); } }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); return () => window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }, []); return (
{/* Left side - Logo and Menu Toggle */}
{/* X Button */} {/* Logo */}

FRAUD GEN

Advanced Fraud Detection System

{/* Right side - Search, notifications, profile */}
{/* Search */}
{/* Notifications */}
{/* Notification dropdown */} {showNotifications && (

Notifications

High-risk transaction detected

Amount: $24,500 - 10 minutes ago

New fraud pattern identified

Multiple transactions from Nigeria - 2 hours ago

System update scheduled

Maintenance planned for 11:00 PM - Today

)}
{/* User Profile */}
{/* Status bar - For system messages/alerts */}
All fraud detection systems operating normally | Last updated: 5 minutes ago
); } export default Header;
